projectDescription: A personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
A fully functional e-commerce website built using React, featuring user authentication, product pages, shopping cart, about page.
A digital agency website offers professional services like web development, app development, and digital marketing.
A social media analytics dashboard built using HTML5, CSS3, JS and Chart.js. Users can track key metrics like followers, likes, and engagement across various platforms.
A weather app that allows users to get current weather conditions and forecast for any location. Built with React, OpenWeatherMap API, and styled with Bootstrap.
A task management tool that helps users organize and prioritize tasks. Built with Python, Django and a SQLite database.
A travel booking system where users can search for and book flights, hotels, and rental cars. Built using Laravel and MySQL, with a real-time booking system.
A real-time chat application built with Socket.io and Node.js. Features include user login, live messaging, chat rooms, and notifications.
A simple expense tracker app built with React that allows users to add, edit, and delete expenses, with visual charts to track spending patterns.
A food delivery app prototype designed with React Native, allowing users to browse menus, order food, and track delivery in real-time.
